Name: White & Light Purple Panel Top
Description:
This sleek white top is elevated with structured blue panels along the neckline, sleeves, and center front. Crafted from soft crepe satin, smooth, .The silhouette is clean and refined - perfect for pairing with statement bottoms or worn alone for a crisp, modern look
\nFabric: Crepe satin

Name: Wide-Leg Trouser with Colorful Side Skirt
Description:
Wide-leg trousers made from a viscose-linen blend, featuring a colorful wrap skirt tied at
\nthe waist for a bold, standout look. These wide-leg trousers come in a soft purple shade and are made from lightweight crepe fabric for a comfortable, relaxed fit. A colorful printed skirt is layered on one side at the waist, adding a stylish and playful touch. The
\nprint combines navy, pink, and white in soft patterns that add a fresh, colorful twist. It’s a stylish piece that feels light, unique, and easy to style for any occasion
\n
\nFabric:
\ntrouser: crepe skirt:63% viscose & 37% linen

Name: Drape Elegant Trouser
Description:
Bring movement and modern elegance to your wardrobe with this wide-leg trouser in a dreamy lavender blue. Made from lightweight crepe, the fabric offers a soft yet structured feel with beautiful natural movement. The relaxed cut adds to the comfort,
\nmaking them perfect for elevated daily wear or dressed-up casual looks.
\n
\nFabric: crepe

Name: Blouse with Colorful Shawl
Description:
A relaxed, flowy blouse completed with a vibrant colorful scarf that adds a an artistic touch. Designed with lightweight fabric for comfort and elegance. Perfect for casual outings or stylish gatherings.
\n
\nFabric:63% viscose & 37% Cotton

Name: Linen Jumpsuit with Embroidered Side Panel
Description: This modern navy jumpsuit is crafted from soft, lightweight linen that moves effortlessly with you. The standout feature is the embroidered side panel, designed with rich, traditional-inspired motifs in vibrant colors like red , green , and navy. The embroidery adds a statement-making touch, balancing comfort with confident elegance. it's a piece made for women who value both ease and individuality in their everyday style \n \n \nFabric: Linen \n \n \n

Name: Colorful modern vest
Description:
A stylish vest that merges ease with personality, crafted
\nfrom a soft and airy linen blend. Featuring bold, traditional-inspired embroidery in rich reds and blues, framed by a modern green edge. It's a lightweight layering piece that
\nelevates any outfit - casual or polished - with effortless flair
\n
\nFabric: Linen
\n
\n

Name: Classic White Crepe Satin Shirt
Description:
A modern staple with a touch of elegance, this white shirt is made from crepe satin that drapes beautifully and feels silky-soft against the skin. With its structured collar and clean silhouette, it’s designed to be your go-to piece for layering under statement vests or styling. Light yet refined, it balances comfort with sophistication.
\n
\nFabric:
\n
\nCrepe Satin
\n
\n

Name: Satin Base Skirt with Printed skirt Overlay
Description:
This striking skirt combines two contrasting elements in one fluid design. The base is a silky fuchsia or blue satin skirt that adds richness and depth, while the wrap-around top layer prints in fuchsia and blue. Tied delicately at the waist, the overlay moves gracefully with every step, bringing volume and visual intrigue. Perfect for occasions where you want to look bold, artistic, and effortlessly elegant.
\n
\nFabric: satin

Name: Wavy Satin Blouse
Description:
Made to move with you, this satin blouse features a soft wavy blue or pink that captures the spirit of calm and motion. Its loose cut, and gathered sleeves blend comfort and sophistication. Whether styled casually or elevated for evening wear, this blouse adds an artistic twist to any outfit.
\n
\nFabric: Satin

Name: Printed Skirt Overlay
Description:
This printed skirt is made to stand out. Designed as an overlay, it ties at the waist and drapes effortlessly over trousers and skirt, adding texture, movement, and contrast to your outfit. The vibrant wavy print in fuchsia and blue makes it a statement layer you can style in endless ways — whether to elevate a matching set or refresh a minimalist look with bold color and fluid shape.
\n
\nFabric: rayon

Name: Wavy Satin Trouser
Description:
This wavy wide trouser is where comfort meets modern elegance. With their relaxed wide-leg cut and soft, fluid fabric, they create graceful movement with every step. The unique wavy tone adds depth and a subtle statement to your look - whether styled with a matching blouse or plain blouse, it’s your go-to for refined everyday dressing.
\n
\nFabric: Satin

Name: Wavy  Blouse
Description:
This blouse is made from lightweight with a silky finish and relaxed silhouette. The print blends cool shades of blue and green in a modern, expressive design. Perfect for everyday looks or dressed-up moments, it offers both comfort and edge.
\n
\nFabric:
\n
\nRayon

Name: Flow Trouser with Side Blisseh
Description:
This wide leg trouser comes in a soft pistachio tone and feature a side slit that unveils structured pleats as you move. The layered detail adds unexpected depth and movement, taking your look from simple to statement. Style them with a colorful blouse for a perfectly balanced outfit that’s both relaxed and elegance
\n
\nfabric:
\n
\nLinen & viscose

Name: Pistachio Trouser with Blisseh Skirt Overlay
Short description:
Pistachio wide-leg trousers with a soft
\nblisseh skirt overlay — tied at the
\nwaist for effortless style
\n
\n
Description:
This trouser is designed to give you the perfect blend of comfort and standout style. It features a soft pistachio tone with a relaxed wide-leg cut, topped
\nwith a light blisseh skirt layer at the waist that adds graceful movement and flow. A perfect piece for everyday wear or evening looks - it brings
\neffortless elegance.
\n
\nFabric:
\ntrouser: linen & viscose
\nSkirt: blisseh

Name: Pistachio Flowy Trouser
Description:
This wide-leg trouser are tailored from a luxurious viscose and linen blend that offers both structure and softness. The fabric is breathable, it moves naturally with your body, making it ideal for daily wear, warm weather, or relaxed occasions. The pistachio tone adds a refreshing twist while keeping your look clean and elevated - perfect for pairing with both basics and bold layers
\n
\nFabric
\nTrouser: 62% viscose 38% LINEN
